Vertical rhythm and text formatting

Text format mean that all the \`button\` tags inside the \`s-format:text\` class scope will be *styled automatically** using the default style and color.

@coffeekraken.s-filtrable-input-componen.name: ${cls}
@coffeekraken.s-filtrable-input-componen.description: This class represent a(n) "<s-color="accent">${style}</s-color>" filtrable input

@coffeekraken.s-filtrable-input-componen.name: s-switch
@coffeekraken.s-filtrable-input-componen.description: This class represent a(n) "<s-color="accent">solid</s-color>" switch

example.code:
<label class="s-label">
  <input type="checkbox" class="s-switch" />
  Pam Pfeffer
</label>

Text format

Text format mean that all the `table` tags inside the `s-format:text` class scope will be *styled automatically** using the default style and color.

@coffeekraken.s-filtrable-input-componen.name: s-toolip-container
@coffeekraken.s-filtrable-input-componen.description:
This class represent the tooltip container in which you have to put your actual .s-tooltip element
and anything you want as a tooltip activator. Can be a button, an image, really anything

example.code: Something cool

@coffeekraken.s-filtrable-input-componen.name: s-toolip-container:active
@coffeekraken.s-filtrable-input-componen.description: This class allows you to display a tooltip inside a tooltip container without needing hover by the user

example.code: Something cool

@coffeekraken.s-filtrable-input-componen.name: s-tooltip
@coffeekraken.s-filtrable-input-componen.description: This class represent a simple block start (top) tooltip

example.code:
I'm a cool button
Something cool

@coffeekraken.s-filtrable-input-componen.name: s-tooltip--interactive
@coffeekraken.s-filtrable-input-componen.description:
This class make a tooltip interactive. This mean that the user can hover the tooltip,
select texts in it, click on buttons, etc...

example.code:
I'm a cool button
Something cool
